channel.title: Theme song inside costom client
channel.description: I've perfected my client for my first server neverscape. But i want it to play a midi when it starts. Like frugooscape and moparscape clients. They play midi's as they boot up. How can i add my personal midi. I'm adding number one from bleach!!!!!!!!!!! :) ;D ;D ;D ;D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2008, 04:34:28 PM[/size][hr]LOL! BUMP! But seriously..... just replay couse i need the help :P
